hero.heading: Transform Slabs Into Sales
hero.paragraph: Clickproducts allows customers to preview products in real-world environments before buying, making visualization simple and realistic.

hero1.heading: Transform the Way You Sell Marble
hero1.paragraph: Streamline your marble business with an intelligent dashboard. Effortlessly manage submissions, reports, and invoicing — all in one place, built exclusively for marble sellers.

hero2.heading: A Smarter Dashboard for Wood Sellers
hero2.paragraph: ClicProduct is built specifically for marble manufacturers who want to manage their entire operation from one intelligent platform.

hero3.heading: From Workshop to World Simplify Every Step.
hero3.paragraph: Organize, manage, and grow your wood business with one powerful tool.

hero4.heading: Sell Smarter. Present Better Manage Everything in One Place.
hero4.paragraph: ClicProduct empowers retailers and distributors to sell more effectively while giving customers a seamless, modern buying experience. From interactive 3D visualization to automated quotes and deliveries, every tool you need is built into one simple platform.

hero5.heading: Build smarter Deliver faster Impress every client.
hero5.paragraph: Clicproduct Gives Renovation Professionals A Complete Digital Toolkit — Helping You Plan, Visualize, And Manage Projects With Precision And Confidence.

hero6.heading: Smart, Simple, and Built for the Future of Product Management
hero6.paragraph: ClicProduct is an all-in-one platform designed for manufacturers, retailers, and distributors who want to manage their entire business — from inventory to sales — in one place. Developed by Crazy Pineapple, this intelligent software connects every part of your operation with automation, analytics, and beautiful product visualization.

hero7.heading: Build a Modern Online Presence for Your Stone Business
hero7.paragraph:
Your website is more than a digital catalog — it’s your first impression. ClicProduct helps marble suppliers, dealers, and exporters build elegant, high-performing websites that turn visitors into buyers.
We combine design precision, SEO expertise, and AI visualization tools to help you stand out in the global stone industry.

hero8.heading: SEO for Marble Businesses: Get Found, Get Chosen, Get Ahead
hero8.paragraph: That’s why ClicProduct’s SEO for Marble Businesses service was built specifically for the stone, tile, and interior materials industry — helping you appear higher on Google, attract serious buyers, and turn searches into sales.

hero9.heading: Turn Your Marble Brand Into a Market Leader — Online and Beyond
hero9.paragraph: That’s where ClicProduct’s Digital Marketing for Marble Businesses comes in. We help stone suppliers, exporters, and showrooms connect with the right audience through smart digital strategy, storytelling, and automation.

hero10.heading: Turning Craftsmanship Into Clicks, Leads, and Lasting Clients
hero10.paragraph: The wood industry is built on timeless design — but selling it requires modern strategy. From flooring suppliers to custom furniture makers, your business deserves visibility, credibility, and consistent online growth.

poweredBy.heading: Powered by Nirwana.ai
poweredBy.paragraph: Nirwana technology allows realistic, real-world previews of all your products without complex setups.

living.title: Living Room
living.description: As one of the most-frequented spots in the home, a living room sets the tone for the rest of the house.

bedroom.title: Bedroom
bedroom.description: Unleash your creativity to make it not only comfortable but also a pleasant place to start and end your day.

office.title: Office
office.description: The home office design ideas featured here are maximized for efficiency, optimized for space, and improvised for comfort by Spacejoy designers.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: The kitchen is the heart of every home — a space where functionality meets style. With Nirwana.ai, you can preview how different materials, colors, and finishes will look in your kitchen before making any decision.

explore_heading: Explore the Future of Visualization with Nirwana.ai
how_step1_desc: Select what you sell (Marble, Wood, or Furniture) from the home page.
how_step2_desc: Get instant access to a personalized dashboard with Submissions, Reports, and Invoicing.
how_step3_desc: Easily handle your tasks, track progress, and grow your business with powerful insights.

faqs.heading: FAQs
faqs.paragraph: Explore our FAQs for quick answers to common queries about our platform.

items.question: What is ClickProducts?
items.answer: ClickProducts is a platform that allows customers to visualize materials and products in real environments before purchasing.

items.question: Can I customize the dashboard for my product type?
items.answer: Yes! You can personalize your dashboard based on whether you sell marble, wood, or other materials.

items.question: Do I need technical skills to use ClickProducts?
items.answer: No technical expertise is needed. Our platform is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly.

items.question: Is there a free trial available?
items.answer: Yes, a free trial is available so you can explore ClickProducts before committing.

column1.title: ClicProduct
column1.description: ClicProduct is a complete platform for the marble industry, helping manufacturers, retailers, and professionals manage projects, orders, and materials in one place.

features.description: Tailored features for marble slabs, tiles, and products.
Easy product uploads with sizes, finishes, and pricing.
Smart categorization designed for stone businesses.
Special features designed for wooden products.
Add product details like size, type (planks, furniture), and pricing.

dashboard.subheading: Your sales. Your data. Organized in one place.

features: Track real-time inventory and slab availability
Manage production schedules and quality checks
Reduce human errors and save time

description.line1: Let your customers explore your marble slabs in realistic 3D directly from your catalog.

features.text: Accurate color, light, and surface reflection
Instant floor, wall, and countertop mapping

videoSection.heading: A Platform That Grows With You
videoSection.description: Whether you produce 100 slabs a week or 10,000, ClicProduct scales effortlessly with your business — integrating smoothly with your existing systems and workflows.

showcase.heading: Showcase Products
showcase.description:
Turn your catalog into an experience your customers will love.
With ClicProduct's interactive 3D viewer, they can explore every marble texture, color, and pattern — as if they were standing in your showroom.
This visual experience builds trust and helps customers make confident decisions faster.

operations.heading: Simplify Daily Operations
operations.feature2: Track inventory and deliveries in real time
operations.feature3: Manage payments and customers from one place

architectHero.heading: Bring Ideas to Life. Visualize Every Detail with Confidence.
architectHero.description: ClicProduct empowers architects and interior designers to turn creative concepts into realistic visual experiences. From material selection to client presentation, everything happens in one elegant and intelligent platform — built to inspire collaboration and speed up decision-making.

visualizeRealism.heading: Visualize with Realism
visualizeRealism.description: No more guessing how a design will look once it's built. With ClicProduct, you can instantly visualize marble, tiles, and surfaces in lifelike 3D environments. Every texture, reflection, and color behaves naturally — just like it would in the real world.
bulletPoints: Preview materials directly on floors, walls, or countertops
Create multiple design versions in minutes

visualizeRealism1.heading: Visualize Before You Build
visualizeRealism1.description: Show clients how their renovated space will look — before the work begins. Upload real room photos, apply your materials, and preview the transformation instantly.

visualizeRealism2.heading: Why Marble Businesses Need a Website
visualizeRealism2.description: In today’s market, 90% of buyers research online before contacting suppliers.Without a professional website, you risk losing high-value clients and export opportunities.
bulletPoints: Showcase your slabs with HD visuals and filters
Build trust with project galleries and testimonials
Attract global buyers through SEO-optimized content

simplifyProject.heading: Simplify Project Management
simplifyProject.description: Stay organized from concept to completion. ClicProduct keeps your materials, quotes, and client preferences synced in one place, so you can move faster and avoid costly mistakes.

simplifyProject1.heading: Simplify Every Project
simplifyProject1.description: Say goodbye to scattered files and long email threads. ClicProduct keeps your quotes, orders, and project data organized in one easy-to-use dashboard.

Eyword.heading: Eyword Strategy for Stone Markets
Eyword.description: We research the most relevant and profitable keywords used by contractors, architects, and distributors — from “marble wall tiles” to “granite exporters Dubai.” Our team builds a targeted map that helps you dominate search results for every stone category you sell.

GrowSmarter.heading: Grow Smarter with ClicProduct
GrowSmarter.description: Our mission is to help product-based companies go beyond static catalogs and move into the future of AI-driven digital experience.

collaborateSection.heading: Collaborate with Clients and Suppliers
collaborateSection.paragraph1: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is what makes your business discoverable. When builders, architects, or homeowners search for “marble suppliers near me” or “imported Italian marble”, the right SEO strategy ensures that your website appears on the first page — not hidden behind your competitors.
collaborateSection.paragraph2: With ClicProduct, clients, designers, and suppliers can all collaborate visually — reviewing designs, materials, and changes in real time.

collaborateClients.heading: Why SEO Matters for Marble  Suppliers
collaborateClients.paragraph1: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is what makes your business discoverable. When builders, architects, or homeowners search for “marble suppliers near me” or “imported Italian marble”, the right SEO strategy ensures that your website appears on the first page — not hidden behind your competitors.

whyChoose.heading: Why Choose ClicProduct ?
whyChoose.description: Our platform combines technology, automation, and design to give your business a modern edge — without the technical hassle.

features.title: Centralized Product Management
features.description:
Easily upload, organize, and update your entire catalog from one smart dashboard.
Say goodbye to messy spreadsheets — everything stays synced across your website, app, and sales tools.

features.title: Customizable Interface for Every Industry
features.description:
Whether you sell marble, wood, or furniture, ClicProduct adapts to your brand.
You can customize layouts, filters, and product views to match your unique style and audience.

features.title: Multi-language & Multi-currency Support
features.description:
Reach customers anywhere in the world.
Our system automatically adjusts your content, prices, and measurements for every market and region.

features.title: SEO-friendly Product Pages
features.description:
Each product page is optimized for search engines, helping your products appear higher on Google.
You'll attract more qualified visitors without needing extra SEO plugins.

features.title: AI-driven Catalog and Visual Tools
features.description:
Turn your product images into an interactive shopping experience.
With AI visualization, customers can preview how your materials look in real environments — building trust instantly.

features.title: Real-time Inventory & Order Insights
features.description:
Track your stock levels, orders, and performance metrics in one place.
Get instant notifications and make faster, smarter business decisions backed by real data.

digitalShowroom.heading: The Power of a Digital Showroom
paragraphs: A professional website has become the modern showroom for marble suppliers. Buyers no longer wait to visit warehouses — they start their journey online.
With ClicProduct, your marble catalog becomes interactive. Each product can be explored, filtered, and compared effortlessly — just like in a physical store.

images.text: ClicProduct’s system is built for growth. Whether you operate in Pakistan, India, the Middle East, or Europe, your marble website adapts to local needs while keeping a global reach.
Our websites come with a built-in inquiry dashboard to manage messages, orders, and requests in one place — so you never miss a lead again.

service1_description:
Transform your Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and TikTok into digital showrooms.
We design elegant, brand-consistent content that attracts architects, interior designers, and homeowners.
service2_description:
Get instant visibility for your top marble collections.
We create ad campaigns that target people searching for marble suppliers, interior materials, and renovation services — with measurable ROI.
service3_description:
Stay connected with your leads and clients.
From automated quotes to personalized updates about new marble arrivals, we set up systems that nurture relationships while you focus on business.
service4_description:
Your marble has a story — origin, texture, craftsmanship.
We turn that story into stunning visuals, videos, and blog articles that inspire trust and emotion.
Good design sells — great storytelling builds loyalty.
service5_description:
Reach both international and local audiences effectively.
We build targeted strategies to help your marble business expand globally while maintaining strong local visibility.
service6_description:
Every click, view, and inquiry tells a story.
We track what works — and refine what doesn't — so every dollar spent brings maximum return.
Our detailed reports show engagement, leads, and conversions in real time.
service7_description: Bring your craftsmanship to life on visual platforms like Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pinterest. We create content strategies that highlight your textures, finishes, and projects — turning followers into loyal customers.
service8_description: Want instant visibility for your wood products? We create highly targeted Google Ads campaigns that bring in potential buyers — from B2B wholesalers to homeowners searching “buy walnut table near me.”
service9_description: Keep your brand top-of-mind with beautifully designed email campaigns. We help you nurture client relationships with newsletters, promotions, and design inspiration updates.
service10_description: Show your story, not just your products. Our team develops professional visuals, videos, and blog articles that position your brand as a trusted authority in the wood industry.
service11_description: Every campaign comes with transparent performance tracking. We show you what’s working — from traffic sources to ROI — and continuously refine strategies to boost conversions.
